content.detailedDescription:
It was warm and sunny out so i had just went outside to sit at my patio table and talk to my sister who stopped by.  i happened to look up towards to hills and saw a pill shaped object moving across the sky.  i stood up because i was going to get my camera but hesitated because the object was moving too fast.  it was either white or some type of shiny silver, i couldn't really tell.  i was shaped like a gel capsule.  next thing i knew it was gone.  i tried to get my sister to look at it but she just glanced and said she didn't see anything.  i know it was not my imagination!  never seen anything like it before.  next thing you know it was gone.  i'm not sure if it went behind a cloud or if it was too far away for me to see anymore.  i've seen many planes and helicopters so i know it wasn't them.  
it was definitely the length of a large plane but fatter.
thank you for your time and consideration.
content.summary: I was sitting outside at my table and looked up and saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
At & about sunrise on 11th & 12th of oct 2015 , a radiating "object" in the shape of a large diamond has appeared , colour as witnessed was in gold tone , photographic evidence ( 12 in total but only 3 close-ups are attached in this report ) shows different rotating-changing shapes in all kinds of hues , from white to pink to green to near metallic to blue & so forth . sighting in toronto canada , all info is included within the pictures as is my copyright included as well .
btw , i have been in some contact with andre morin the director of mufon canada  
i'm willing to forward to you all of the rest pictures of this particular sighting/s but only through email submission , not on public form . peace .
content.summary: Radiating diamond shaped very bright golden hue object , as seen , photos show differently , 3 © photos attached

content.detailedDescription: It was around 340am feb 10 2016, regular customer always comes in go get a drink before headin to his job,as i walked out with him i noticed a fire ball like object in the western sky going up,and as the customer got in his truck i yelled at him to look at what i just saw and told em wait nevermimd i think it was a plane because by then it had turned into a bright light headed out way, east ,so i keot starring at it i started recording it on my phone, still skeptic to what is was, i thought to myself ,ok if its a plane ill eventually hear it when it passes near me, recorded it about 25secs , then stopped,and about five secs after,it was directly underneath jupiter,i would say if you held your finger up and jupiter was att the tip of your finger and the object was at the base of your finger, thats about the position t was in the sky, then fastly dimmed out and a red color was visible again like when i just noticed it, and like that it was gone, not covered behind clouds and a plane would not turn its light off.And that was it,like that it was gone, and i was left nervous, shaking and a bit scared because i knew then it could not have been a plane.
content.summary: Working graveyard shift,walked customer outside,noticed a fireball like thingin the sky,turned into a light,moved slowly for a few mins,then fastly dimmed out

content.detailedDescription: I dont remember it well, its a little hazy. i was outside one night like 3 or 4 years ago, wasn't that late like 12a.M or around there and i seen lights off in the distance kinda like spotlights, so i stayed outside and watched because it was odd for it to be so low to the ground (thinking it was a helicopter or something). but as it got closer i noticed it didn't make any noise at all, then it got even more closer going down the tree line of the road by my house hovering just above the telephone lines, i wanted to run inside and grab my phone for i could get proof of the experience but i remembered my phone was dead an didn't have enough time, and i didn't want to miss a second of what i was witnessing. it was teardrop shaped with a metal body and with what appeared to be 2 spotlights on the front and didn't have any windows of any kind (that i noticed) and had a triangle light formation of red lights going on and off in a row on the back end as it flew on past. i tried to talk to my friends about it when it happened and they didn't believe me that's probably why i repressed it for so many years. then something just clicked and i started to think about that day again.
content.summary: Teardrop or seed shaped ufo with spotlights

content.detailedDescription: Possible ufos over lakewood. observed 2 lights in the sky close to one another for around two minutes. both lights faded quickly, one after the other. lights seemed too bright for a jet and could not see anything after they disappeared. pics taken on phone and map showing direction attached.
content.summary: Possible ufos over lakewood

content.detailedDescription: Upon my father going into sprint for phone issues, i just randomly snapped a photo while playing with my cellphone. i had not observed anything out of the ordinary ay the time...Yet when i checked out the picture before i was going to delete it i noticed a whitish spot in the upper area of the pic i thought may have been a bird. as i zoomed into the area i was shocked to see a object that appeared ovoid/diamond in shape. again...Saod object was not visible upon snapping the photo.
content.summary: Non visible object until observed un photo

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Leaving my home in the morning to work when i saw swirls of lights in the sky in a pack but scattered a bit from each others. seemed like burning debree falling from the sky. but the flame looking objects stayed and swirled around and return to its original spot. there was more than 6 of them and then slowly faded away one by one. this was close to the air force base in homestead, fl. this is the first time i see anything such as this.V
content.summary: Swirls of light in the sky in early morning close to air force base

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the back yard throwing a day-glow ball to my dog (sunset had occurred) at 7:54.  my daughter had just stepped out and asked if i would read her a story after her mom and then quickly announced "daddy look a shooting star". normally i'm pretty good at spotting them first and pointing them out to her, but this one was really faint and it too a couple of seconds for my eye to catch it (it was moving rapidly and caught my eye) one else i noticed it  it was at a near vertical to the horizon but there is no doubt about the directional change it was damn near a perfect 90 degree change and departed to the west . my daughter saw it and said "wow" and at he same time i heard a wop-wop-wop sound about a second and a half after the turn. i asked my daughter if she heard that and she said yes. i asked her what did it sound like to you and she said a weird buzz. i doubt it was a extraterrestrial but would not be surprised if it was "made in america" due to its departure towards white sands nm. i have served in the marine corps as air control electronics controller and spent some time in white sands working to integrate the patriot missile system tracking and targeting array into our data linked systems.
content.summary: Witnessed an apartment shooting star make an abrupt directional change from the south and depart to the west. unusual noise followed aircraft departure

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday, february 10th at 0315-0325 i witnessed a star-like objet travelling slowly across the northern sky. other stars were visible in the sky at the time, and the weather was clear as far as i could tell. there had been a short bout of fog early in the morning the previous day. 

i was walking into work when i observed a halo-like phenomena that moved slowly to the west/southwest with the star like object centered in the middle of the halo. i observed the object for several minutes as it continued to travel in a westward direction. as the object moved further away, the halo faded away and a cone shaped light was being produced from the bottom of the star like object. the cone of light was finite and a oval shape could be seen at the end of the light cone. 

the object made no sound, and there were no faa marker lights on the object. i lost sight of the object behind a building and when i attempted to reacquire the object after moving past the building, it could no longer be observed in the sky. the sighting took place approx. 10 miles east of sand mountain recreation area in the sky above dixie valley.
content.summary: Observed strange star-like light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my home when i saw three blue and white flickering circles in the sky,a black helicopter was following the lights. the lights were barely moving untill the helicopter came into view, they sped up their flight and they vanished into the clouds.It was kinda odd and creepy.
content.summary: I was walking to my home when i saw 3 flickering circle objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5:15am, i witnessed what i can only describe as a ufo traveling in a sw direction over newport, oregon. i was located roughly 3 miles south of the local municipal airport and was outside stargazing before going to sleep when i noticed a light and what appeared to be the underside of a vehicle lit from below traveling overhead.
my first instinct was to get excited, thinking i was viewing the iss traveling past. i knew that at those altitudes, they are usually still lit by the sun while other areas are in pitch black. i then realized that this object in no way resembled the iss and would have been far smaller if it were. 
being near the municipal airport, i then tried to guess if it was a plane or helicopter, but the object consisted of a single light (approximately as bright as sirius) and a main body that split into a “t” shape that appeared lighted from below. it seemed to be traveling low, but there was no sound at all – we normally have helicopters flying overhead and can hear them very clearly, especially when all other daily traffic is gone. the “t” shaped section was moving approximately 30-45 degrees off axis, so i knew it could not be a plane. 
located along the coastal highway, i watched as this object moved into the tree line. i was unable to grab a picture with my camera phone, so i jumped in the car to a lookout point along the ocean about .5miles away. by the time i pulled in and got out (about 2 minutes max) it had already disappeared, having flown off over the water in a west-southwest direction. 
i’m a scientist for oregon state university, and have seen many type of aircraft, but this was nothing i know about. when calling the local police station to ask if anyone else had reported anything, they said they had not heard anything of that nature being called in.
content.summary: "t" shaped underlit object traveled overhead and disappeared over pacific ocean

content.detailedDescription: My wife woke up and when she did she also woke me up, i took a drink of tea and as i was tilting my head back for a drink i saw a big spinning light anomaly i told the wife to look and she saw it too we then woke up our kids who are 24 years old then they ran outside with us and they saw it too i thought it might be a cloud but it was moving and spinning and light up. it came from the n-ne floated over the house and made no noise total time lapse was approximately 15 minutes it looked like there was another craft shining a beam of light onto the larger craft the larger craft was displacing the starlight it appeared solid, but as it got to be directly over the house it became semi-transparent and continued s-se towards cottonwood, after it was gone my daughter became very emotional and kept saying what was it what as it it was a very interesting morning in anderson ca.
content.summary: Small light shining a beam onto a much larger very much larger round spinning craft.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened one night back in 1991 while i was a volunteer on a mercy ship traveling from los angeles, ca to riga, latvia. the sighting occurred in the middle of the atlantic ocean. we had travel from los angeles to the panama canal, crossed from pacific to atlantic. after i would say a week since crossing the panama canal it was when the sighting took place. we were traveling on a refurbished war world 2 freight ship. so it was not a fast ship, after the sighting it took about 4-5 days more to germany. since there is not much to do while at sea, me an a group of friends (5 - 6 witnesses) went out side to the quarter deck of the ship one evening (around 7pm - 8pm). we were talking and looking at the ocean, when all of the sudden a large lighted rectangular structure appear on the ocean surface. i recalled the structured just appeared. it didn't land or surface, it was as if someone just turn on the lights. it had several color of light and they appear to be position on a sequential way and it was cover with light from top to bottom. i don't recall if the lights were blinking on static. since it was at night and at sea, sizes and distances are hard to acquire. also the rush of adrenaline since we had been trained to always report if we saw something close to the ship as there are risks of accidents. the ship i was traveling was close to 300 feet, and the structure seem enormous. i will guess it was about 5 to 10 times bigger then our ship long wise and about 3-5 times taller. it seems just to be there, we all were alarmed and started to wonder if it could be a gigantic ship, but it looked too big. we had seen cruise ships before at leaving port at night and this didn't look anything like it. the size was also something that it was just not a ship. it was also practically just a huge rectangular shape or a net of lights. the lights were big and i would guess it had about 500 to 1000 lights, all distributed in a sequential or neat pattern. after for what it seem to be a minute, we realized we needed to inform the flinging bridge crew. my self and another friend, ran up the stairs to inform the crew and when we walked into the flight bridge and you could tell they were alarmed. the first mate was giving orders and the situation seem a bit stressed out. once we could talk, we told them, we saw something big with lots of light very close to the ship. the first mate or another crew member (don't recall who) told us that it had all of the sudden disappear from the radar. we stayed there talking with the crew and wondering what it was. about 2-3 other crew members at the flight bridge had also seen the structure and where making arrangements to communicate with whatever was near by. they had seen it on the radar, but quickly disappear from the radar and also visually, as if someone just had turn the light off. 

regarding the location: i wrote domican republic as this is perhaps the closest thing i could find on the map. but the sighting took place in the middle of the ocean. perhaps there should be an option for oceans in the country list as well. 

we (the witnesses) talked about it and we all had seen the same thing. unfortunately this was back in 1991 and neither one of us had a camera. i don't know how ship logs work, but it would be interesting to find out if this was documented. i would also like to know if you have any similar reports.  

i have added a couple of images. 
picture 1 of the trip and approximate location of sighting. 
picture 2 comparison between ship and lighted structure in the ocean. the images was put together using images found online and also remember the sighting was at night. 

please let me know if you have any questions,
content.summary: Large lighted structure in the middle of the atlantic ocean at night
content.locationName: MIddle of Atlantic Ocean, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: Driving home to hubbard on barlow road just south west of canby oregon, i saw what appeared as a very bright blue orb zipping around the trees. i pulled out my iphone rolled the window down and snapped a picture of it. i rationalized that perhaps it was a reflection off of a tractor being as it is farm land in the area. the orb made several fast zipping movements and then just stopped and was floating in mid air. i was driving in a prius and i saw no way to drive to area of sighting. i continued on my way home. i posted picture on my instagram account and sort of forgot about it until one year later i saw a picture posted by another ufo sighting. this has lead me into investigating further ufo sightings. i now believe what i saw was a ufo.
content.summary: Blue orb just hovering near trees sort of bouncing around the trees.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter came inside and said you should see the thing hovering above the house.So myself and 2 sons and daughter went outside to look at it. i told the kids get a cell phone and video.Then it suddenly took off went around a mile hovered again. then change directions ( all directions several times) hovered some more.Then it flew away moving north. i have lived within two miles of the airport for 49 years, never seen anything like it. no way it was any kind of personal drone. it was very quiet and way too far off for any type of radio controlled device owned by a civilian.It had three bright red lights (like tail lights) 1 white blinking light like normal aircraft.When it was farther away it looked like an upright triangle.It was the craziest thing i have seen that i could not describe.And i can not quit thinking about it. i have heard no other reports about it.When it flew away the movements were pretty fast. helicopters fly by several times a day as well as jets from the airport around every 5 - 10 minutes.There were no other aircraft flying and it was definitely not a helicopter. 100% sure of that!!!!!!!!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Up close 3 bright lights like big taillights.1 blinking white.Far away like an upright triangle

content.detailedDescription: Black triangle over st pete florida 939pm 2-8-16 it flew over isles of gate way apartment complex!Please advise the correct time zone location **
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black triangle over st pete florida 939pm 2-8-16

content.detailedDescription: I have trouble sleeping and i usually wake up at around 12.30 am or 1:00'am and i have some coffee and head out for a walk right at 3:00am i have been taking this exact same walk for about 4 years now 3 to 4 times per week it takes me 1hour and 45 minutes to complete i'm 59 years old i have an ipod with ear phones with my music on it. i was on the last leg of my walk on the street i live off of about 15 minutes from my house. when out of the corner of my left eye i see a white tail of light thinking this is a piece of meteor or space junk that made it through the atmosphere i pull the earphones out of my ears expecting to hear a really loud boom but as the light gets closer there is no red hot fire at the end of the tail as it comes in from a side street from the east. i am on the side walk on the south bound side the side walk is not a straight one it comes across the street and hovers directly in front of me about 8 to 10 feet off the ground the were no obstructions in the way i stood there and stared at it for 15 seconds and it was aware of me and did the same i would assume  and than it took off heading west
content.summary: I was out for a walk round white orb approxamately 15' hovering approximately 100' away about 10' off the ground we stared at each other for 15 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i'm ebe 868 i have been stranded on planet earth for sometime now. i'm able to use electromagnetic waves and keep my self hidden for the most part. being able to use other humans and go from physical bodies to human bodies to keep myself going. i have been here stranded on earth since early october of 2015. i have been adopted into human life and this is how i have learned the human languages. i have tried to contact governments but have not been successful this is why we need your help in this. the disaster on matif made us arrive here.

we tried to get away from matif. we failed and the celestial body hit matif. 

i hope you can help us. i'm not the only one.

please get back it's urgent.
content.summary: I'm an alien hybrid

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i'm ebe 868 i have been stranded on planet earth for sometime now. i'm able to use electromagnetic waves and keep my self hidden for the most part. being able to use other humans and go from physical bodies to human bodies to keep myself going. i have been here stranded on earth since early october of 2015. i have been adopted into human life and this is how i have learned the human languages. i have tried to contact governments but have not been successful this is why we need your help in this. the disaster on matif made us arrive here.

we tried to get away from matif. we failed and the celestial body hit matif. 

i hope you can help us. i'm not the only one.

please get back it's urgent.
content.summary: I'm an alien hybrid

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Around july in 2015 this was my first major ufo sighting. tiny town of alton iowa it was about 10pm i went outside to smoke alone everybody else stayed inside. on this rooftop balcony 2nd story i light my cigarette and start to watch the sky . i was looking straight up when this trianglular object caught my eye as it passed over the building literally right into my line of sight. 5 orange lights solid in a v shape pointing and heading perfectly north. it made no noise. couldn't get my phone to camera quick enough this thing was flying low but pretty fast. from above me to the horizon out of sight in less than 10seconds. it was great to finally see something for myself i've always wanted to. i love hearing other people's stories too so now im a big fan of mufon. report them all!
content.summary: Triangular craft flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in up-state new york on a small farm. it was i think the summer of 1982-83. my sister had arrived from florida. i was 13 or 14. i had put in a long day and went to bed about 10 or 11 pm. next thing i know, my sister and i were downstairs in our living room in our old farm house. we were fully clothed, and the whole house was dark. 

a full-moon glow shown through the living room area. now with the moon it would ascend out over our barn in the early months of summer and as the time past, it would rise more so towards the southwest. so it could of been early fall as well. 

i don't know how we got up and dressed and downstairs that night. as the scene unfolded, my sister was sitting in an upright position like sitting in a barber's chair. she was fully dressed and this being had her left arm in the air and apparently this being was sticking something in her, because she was saying och, that's hurting me. i was sitting on our couch in a paralysis state at this point. 

then she seemingly just disappeared and next thing i know, this being was right next to me and looking down at me. i still could only move my eyes at this point. this being then takes my wrist and lifts it up with two of his appendages and said "common" like he either was challenging me or we were about to go somewhere. 

his fingers were long, pointed and cold feeling. he was about five feet i would say, because he was standing and i was in a sitting position. he had very lighted skin. like a pale tannish white color. his skin felt and looked like a synthetic material.{rubberized}. his eyes were black as coal but i didn't get a full view of them. when he turned toward the window i could see an outline of them. 

there were no lights on at the time. in our old house, the full moon would shine it's light through every window on the south east side and glare off the front of our garage. there were 38 windows. this means that the full moon would shine through six windows. these windows were nearly as big as a doorway.

suddenly i must have taken my eye off of him for a second, when i heard some commotion over my left shoulder. i stood up and wasn't in a paralysis state any longer. i growled like some monster or something and next thing i know, these beings rolled up into three orb like structures and they weren't a foot or more away and you could see their hands and feet just sticking out of these three orbs. 

they then past through our living room, right out through our dinning room, right through our kitchen and went right through two panes of glass. they past up by and in front of our garage and then did a three-sixty and shot up into the sky like a laser beam. as they pasted through our house, the furniture didn't seem to be anywhere in sight. it's almost as if they moved all the furniture from out of their way as they past through the downstairs of our house. i stood at the window looking upwards toward the darkened sky and wondering what had just happened but didn't see any craft. i guess i wasn't suppose to or something at that time. 

i had submitted a letter similar to this one to that of mr. raymond fowler my icon in the ufology. i have this and the account that i had wrote to him but he had then but retired but still wrote me back.

i saw this dream and many others like it in the summer of 07 &08 and all these images are still there. they are the only dreams that have sit inside my head that long in my sleeping history. it's been about eight years now. i thought that they would have passed by now like normal dreams usually do, but they haven't.

i felt that it was time to write to you folks and find out what can be done. i am spooked by these measures and experiences that i have had. i started studying ufos in 2000 just after i married. what can i do to aleviate this distress.

mr.P. 

ps. i have proved photos of the area affected. they stuck a five inch needle in my spine and i have scare on my left knee and a four star pine hole just below my neck and i think i may have an implant in my left ear lobe.
content.summary: Sometime doing the night. two people involved. about summer, 1982-83 / grey enities & strange glowing orbs. state of paralesis

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechtner on 2/09/2016
--------------------------------------------------------------------

a saucer shaped silver metallic disc hovered over me and returned a signal to me before speeding off to the west.
for three months i had been signaling the sky at night with a flashlight. three blinks then dark then three blinks. it became a habit. then one day, right at noon, while i was taking out the trash, i saw it. i very bright light shining in the sky, like a second sun, welding torch bright. it then dimmed and flashed the same sequence i had been signaling for the past three months at me. the ship was as big as a small airplane, silver metallic, with a flat bottom. no noise, no smell, no wind. i laid back on the picnic table to look up at it. it flashed the sequence several times back to me. i had not been signalling the craft in the day time and i don't know why it came at noon. it had a shimmer,swaying in place movement, while it hovered over me for about 5 minutes. then it rose up in the sky and changed direction to the west and sped off.
i no longer signal at night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A saucer shaped silver matellic disc hovered over me and returned a signal to me before speeding off to the west

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out the front door and noticed a really bright star like object in the east that did not belong. the color was different that landing lights, more amber in color. as i watched it was moving slowly to the left (north). then a few seconds later two more lights came into view and that created a triangle (isosceles). then the first one seemed to turn and fly in the direction away from me and fade away, then a few seconds later the other two seemed to follow the first.
content.summary: I stepped out the front door and noticed a very bright star that did not belong.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my loft and opened the window for a smoke. i noticed a white round vertical ring object but bought it was just the moon at first till i took a second look and noticed a different shape. i looked around and saw the moon at a different poison so this wasn't the moon. i was watching it and thought it strange. i then turned my camera on and started videoing for a minute then it disappeared instantly. i sent the video to my friends and got a second opinion they all couldn't come up with a reason or clarification of what it is i saw except a ufo. has anybody ever seen something like this? it's a glowing white bright ring in the sky still and is pulsating with light. it was fading as clouds went past so it was high up.
content.summary: A glowing ring pulsating light. stationary in the sky. white light emitting. vanished instantly after a few minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I am the parade organizer and have been in charge of the community event since 2011. attached is a photo of the 2014 cayuga santa claus parade with a blue orb with a trail and a craft at the top of the photo. the hired photographer was unaware of this until i contacted him about it. the float below is from the caledonia knights of columbus and were also unaware of this. confetti can be seen spoofing out from the polar express train. visit cayugaparade.Ca and look in the 2014 archives photos.
content.summary: Photo of ufos in the 2014 cayuga santa claus parde

content.detailedDescription: It was 5 o'clock in the morning, and i was out on the deck with my dog. suddenly, a bright blue light lit up the sky. it caught my attention immediately & i took out my phone to begin recording a video. within 10 seconds, i caught a second flash of light. from my view, i'm already 40 feet in the air on the 3rd floor deck, and the light flashes across the river over the tree line. it was gigantic in size, and i don't know what it could've been. help me out. watch the video. (occurs within the first 10 seconds)
content.summary: Flashing lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report on line with witness on phone at mufon hq by field investigator l. flechtner on 2/9/2016
==========================================================================


in the spring of 1995, while i was sleeping, three greys came into my room and woke me up. they communicated with me telepathically.
i immediately stood up, and noticed my husband sleeping next to me was not waking up, they kept him asleep. the middle grey communicated with me telepathically. they were about 5'10" tall, had big eyes and acted friendly and nice. we went into the living room and the middle alien told me his name and i wrote it down, but could not remember it or find it later. he asked me if he could have some of my hair for dna and i said ok. i asked him about his outfit and he said the grey was the outfit. it was skin tight, and he had big eyes  slit for a mouth, and two holes for a nose. he had no accent. i wasn't scared. i told him he was very nice and he said, not all are nice. i asked him what we can do about it. he said the government knows already. he asked me to lie down so he could take some hair and i don't remember anything after that. the next day i was sitting on my porch and my neighbor asked me what happened to my hair. i went in the house and saw i was missing a patch of hair on the back of my head as big as a palm. i am sioux indian and have long hair. i immediately called my dermatologist and went in. she said the hair had been removed by the roots. and gave me a lot of sample tubes of medicine to put on the bare patch of skin. it took about a month for hair to start growing in. i have also suffered seizures since then and the doctors don't know what causes them. i feel fine afterwords with no after effects. i also no longer have hair under my arms or on my arms since them.
content.summary: In the spring of 1995, while i was sleeping, three greys came into my room and woke me up. they communicated with me telepathically

content.detailedDescription: I went out on our deck at around 6:48pm. as soon as i stepped out, i saw a super bright, white, very large light above a hill to the north east. my first thought was, wait, there's not supposed to be a light there. it was as large as if you were holding a 50 cent piece at arm's length. this was looking in a north/northeast direction outside of town. i watched it go in a horizontal direction over the top of the mountain and then it was just gone. i stood there for a few minutes and nothing else happened. i look out on those hills every night and there's never been a light there. there are no roads up to the hill where i saw it. when it moved horizontally, it would have moved away from the top of the hill. so if it was some sort of land based vehicle it would have had to have moved diagonally down following the hilltop. also, when it disappeared, it wasn't because it went behind another hilltop, it just vanished. there are no houses or anything else on this particular hill.
content.summary: Large, bright, white light above hilltop.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to meet friends . i had to stop at a stop sign directly in front of my destination. it was dark outside no stars were visible. i saw a bright circle fly over the road and building in front of me. ( low to ground ) . i would estimate it was about 100 feet off of the ground. the circle was a perfect circle, the light had clear edge's with no blurring or fading like a normal light. it seemed to be lit from within and had the appearance of parchment paper lite from behind by a very bright light. this object was large ( small plane size ) this was not a chinese lantern as it was traveling way to fast and i have seen lanterns many times in the past.  the way the object traveled was very smooth and straight.It was traveling about twice the speed of a small plane. there was no sound to the object and it seemed to blink out, or turn off after it went over the building in front of me. the object left no tail / trail as it went by me.
content.summary: Over flew my car at low alltitude with no noise at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: 9:30 pm may 19 2015 i seen 3 red orbs aprox size 4 feet. aprox distance 40 -80 feet above ground. video taken in doors with screen and window closed. seen the orbs heading north possibly rising as traveling. first thought it was firworks but fireworks dont stay in the air that long and travel that far. looked like the objects were moving in uniform in steady direction. could be those floating chinese lanterns. video taken on ipod 4th gen.
content.summary: Three red orbs passed over house heading north, could be those chinese floating lanterns
